13313122211111121.content:
"Akihiko!" Mitsuru gasped, horrified. "How could you? He is only a child!"

"By fighting shadows, he is a full-fledged adult just like the rest of us," Akihiko shrugged. "Besides, he fought admirably, there is no shame in a defeat like that."

"I *hack* I'm not done... yet," Ken coughed, picking himself up and leaning on his spear for support.

"Still not finished?" Akihiko flashed a wicked smile. "Looks like this is getting interesting after all."

"Dammit!" Mitsuru swore. "Aigis, standby!" she commanded, as she ran to block Akihiko's advance.

"Mitsuru!" Akihiko flinched. "This doesn't concern you."

"You have gone completely out of your mind, Akihiko. Since you refuse to listen to reason, it seems that violence is the only answer. Now, let's settle this, 'like men,' I believe you said?" Mitsuru said cooly as she untied her ribbon, unbuttoned her blouse and cast it aside, leaving only an elegant dark bra covering her chest, mirroring the state of the other three fighters.

"M-Mitsuru!?" Akihiko blinked, turning slightly red.

"So even Mitsuru's getting into this?" Shinjiro shrugged. "Heh, reminds me of the good old days. Guess our fight has to wait, Akihiko."

"Ma... Mitsuru-san," Ken said, gritting his teeth as he got into position alongside Mitsuru, as both pairs squared off against each other for the next round.

"Phew!" said Minako, stretching her arms. "Aigis sure has a tight grip. So, you ready for this, Junpei-kun?"

"I was born ready, Minako-chan," said Junpei.

"Okay then, here we go!" Minako cheered as she reached around and unclasped her bra.

"Wh-Whoa!" Junpei gasped as Minako pulled it off her body, exposing her breasts. "Already? I didn't think you'd actually do this till we got there."

"What's the matter, Junpei-kun?" Minako said, spinning her bra around one of her fingers. "Getting cold feet?"

"Hardly! You just took me by surprise, that's all," he said as he went to work taking off his clothes.

"Hm, now that I think of it..." Minako pondered, tossing her bra casually aside. "Just the two of us might be a little dull."

"What, backing down already?" Junpei balked, having removed his shirt and jacket by this point.

"Come on, you know the saying: 'The more the merrier?' So how about it, Yukari-chan?" Minako asked. "Want to take part in the Ultimate Tartarus Challenge?"

"Uh... look, Minako-chan," Yukari said. "I know we're friends and all here, but I don't think I'm ready to bare it all right now, you understand? And also, Stupei over there will probably ruin whatever fun I can get out of this little game by watching, so I should probably just stay here."

As if on instinct, Fuuka's eyes snapped open and she wiggled an arm out to pull the fabric from beneath her body.

"Haha, what's she doing now?"

"Is she gonna do some sort of naked dance with that cloth?"

'Pft! You wish..."

Ignoring the class as best she could, Fuuka, brought it in front of her and examined it. The color and composition looked familiar, but she couldn't quite place it, that is, until she turned it around and saw the size tag in the middle. Th-These are my shorts! she thought. But why are they like this? Underneath where I was sitting...? Wait!

With realization, she leaned over and checked under her desk, (knowing she would be exposed yet again, but was too focused to notice,) and found two more similar scraps of cloth, which she soon identified as the rest of her shorts and her shirt.

"They should match here... and this... that means-!" she said, breathing in sharply, and looking up, seeing the class having huddled all around her, now just as curious as they were mocking/perving earlier.

"EEEK!" Fuuka squealed, clutching her destroyed clothes to her body and hunching down into her chair.

"Fuuka Yamagishi," the teacher said, towering over her angrily. "I will give you one, just one, chance to explain yourself. Why. Are. You. Naked?"

"Ah! Ah... er..." Fuuka stammered, overwhelmed with everything that had happened. Focus, Fuuka, she said to herself. This is the only chance you have. It's embarrassing, but you can do it, you have to do it. Or else... well, don't think about or else!

"Well?" the teacher said threateningly.

"Y-yes, um... It's because of this," Fuuka said, drying her tears and picking out her shorts while keeping the shirt-cloth covering her front.

"These are your shorts, what of it?" the teacher asked, taking them as evidence.

"D-Don't you see?" Fuuka said nervously. "The edges, these haven't been ripped. They, they've been cut. By a scissor or something like that?"

"I see... it certainly looks that way. And you're saying you did this, then?" the teacher growled.

"No!" Fuuka gasped. "W-Why would I cut off... my own clothes?"

"Do you really think someone could get away with tampering with another student's clothes in my classroom, under MY watch? Do you think I'm incompetent?"

"Well, you were the last one to realize Fuuka was naked, other than herself that is!" another classmate said snidely.

"Silence!" the teacher shouted. "Regardless, the notion that anyone could just do that to someone else so easily is ludicrous! So what is really going on here?"

Fuuka didn't know what to say. It was ludicrous. Surely she would have known if someone was taking her clothes apart, right? Could that have been what that draft was? But even so, and even if they had succeeded without getting spotted, who would even do such a thing to begin with...? Well, there was that girl, the one with the perverted note and mind, but even if it was, why would she do this to her? She hadn't even said two words to her before now, so why would she do something so horrible? To do this to another person... no matter what her reasons were, that was too cruel! She couldn't just let that girl get away with this! It was all too insane, it was like she was in a nightmare!

Wait... what if this was a nightmare? That would explain everything that had happened with Minako, and the girl's actions right now. And isn't being naked at school one of the most common nightmares? Everything certainly felt real, but there were dreams that had that quality to them, a lucid dream, was it? In that case, all she had to do was ride it out. Anything she did right now would be pointless, as she would just wake up in her own bed soon enough.

The truth was, however, everything that was happening was very real, but the possibility that all this was just a dream was a very tempting option for Fuuka and her overburdened psyche. Tempting... Tempting...

She made her choice.

"Well, what do you have to say for yourself, Fuuka Yamagishi!?" the teacher demanded.

"Well, sir," Fuuka said, feeling eerily calm, despite only being covered in front by a damaged, unwearable shirt, "The thing is-"

School was over before Fuuka knew it, but she decided to pay a quick visit to Gekkoukan's art club before she left. While they didn't typically meet on Saturdays, they'd agreed to meet in order to make up for missing their Thursday meeting.

The embarrassing incident-

1341.content:
Fuuka smiled softly as she stepped inside the club's meeting room, offering a quiet "Hello" to those assembled. Despite it being a Saturday afternoon, they'd managed to get a near-perfect turnout, much to Fuuka's surprise. The others must really be dedicated, she thought. What didn't surprise her were all the sewing machines situated in a loose circle around the room's center, as if they were loitering there. Keisuke had been pleased to inform his fellow club mates that the school had provided them with new equipment at last, and while several of them had grumbled about how sewing hardly counted as art, Fuuka was willing to at least give it a try.

Thursday's meeting had been cancelled due to the grumblers informing Keisuke that they would return as soon as they got back to painting. Despite Fuuka's presence that day, she'd been forced to re-attend once their bespectacled club leader informed the dissenters that they needed to at least try the sewing machines out, and that if everyone really hated them, they never had to use them again; a fair compromise, in Fuuka's book.

It was with this attitude that the art club met once more. The grumbling ceased after a few minutes, and some of the assembled students found themselves actually doing an alright job; Fuuka was not one of those students, unfortunately. Her affinity for technology didn't extend to devices as old as the provided sewing machines, and it didn't take long for her to wind up with a completely hopeless doily. Keisuke offered to help her, but she just smiled sheepishly and told him she'd figure it out.

That was when everything started to go downhill for Fuuka. If she'd known what was about to happen, she'd have skipped the meeting altogether.

On about her fourth attempt at spinning her yarn into something even remotely workable, Fuuka found her machine stopping all of a sudden. Frowning with frustration, and worried she might have somehow broken it, she got to her feet and leaned over the machine, lightly hitting it with the palm of her small hand. She wasn't usually keen on "fixing" machines like that, but with a machine that old, she wondered if it didn't just need a light jostling. To her credit, her surprise, that seemed to do the trick.

However, as Fuuka sat back down, she failed to notice a few stray threads from her skirt getting stuck in the needle of the machine. Glad to see she'd finally done something right, she quietly continued trying to actually sew something, gradually unraveling her own skirt inch-by-inch.

It took her a few minutes and two more failed attempts to realize something was wrong, and by that time, her skirt was a full three inches shorter! It was barely even covering her underwear now, and the machine was still going! With a quiet "Eep!", Fuuka attempted to tug her skirt back down to her knees, willing it to get longer again. Needless to say, that didn't work, and more and more of Fuuka's white nylons peeked out from under her quickly-shortening skirt.

What was she going to do? She needed to stop the machine, or soon she would end up losing her skirt! But she couldn't stand up; not like this. If the others realized what she'd accidentally done to herself, she'd never hear the end of it.

Fuuka felt her cheeks turning red as she decided to-

13411.content:
The absolute last thing Fuuka needed was to draw everyone's attention to her and her disappearing skirt. There had to be something she could do quickly and quietly to handle the situation. But what? She couldn't figure out how to get the machine to stop, and just waiting for it to break down again was out of the question.

Following a hunch, Fuuka tried tugging on the thread of her skirt being fed through the machine, hoping she might be able to snap it free. Unfortunately, all this accomplished was making the machine work harder against her pulling, causing a grinding noise to begin emanating from the machine. Seeing other club members start to look up from their work in curiosity, Fuuka quickly abandoned this plan, letting the machine continue its work and cease grinding.

Fuuka could feel her time running out. Her skirt had diminished to the point that she could feel it disappearing between her body and her seat. She didn't have to look down to know just how much was showing at this point. Fuuka could feel her heart start racing; she needed a plan, and quickly! Her analytically inclined mind considered the possibility of finding a way to jam the machine. Force the needle to stop moving and at the very least keep her skirt from shrinking any further, even though there wasn't much skirt left to salvage. Opposite this idea there was a more "practical" one, at least practical so far as her nervous mind was concerned.

"Technically, I have all the materials I need to make a new skirt. I just need to figure out how to sew it into the proper shape, shouldn't be too terribly hard." Fuuka's mind told her. The idea seemed crazy since Fuuka didn't know the first thing about tailoring. On the other hand, what could it hurt to try?

Jamming the machine would still leave her with a shamefully short skirt, and that was completely unacceptable. Besides, she thought, what could be a better way for her to improve her sewing than working under this kind of intense pressure? Maybe this was the moment when she'd finally tap into some sort of hidden artistic talent that had been buried deep, deep inside her all those years.

She had to give it a shot. She'd pulled the team out of tougher spots than this in their trips into Tartarus, so surely she could pull herself out of an embarrassing blunder all on her own. Besides, she'd worn enough skirts to have an idea of the basic shape one needed to be. How hard could it really be? Riding a wave of unsure courage, Fuuka set to work making herself a new skirt.

It took approximately a minute before she realized her plan really had no chance of working. To start, Fuuka may have known what sort of shape a skirt was meant to have, but getting it to take a shape even remotely close to that was the tricky part; actually, it was the entire thing. She'd hoped that would be the tricky part, but it turned out that all of it was tricky. There wasn't a single part of this that was going well.

Two minutes in, and Fuuka could feel her skirt disappear underneath her entirely, leaving her with practically nothing except the part around her waist. Fuuka felt her cheeks turning redder as she realized the only thing covering her panties were her white nylons, and those were nearly transparent! And she still wasn't any closer to making a serviceable skirt for herself. She needed to do something, and fast!

Her first instinct was to just grab her bag and bolt for the door, but if she did that, she knew she'd be seen. Her other option was to try and find some way to cover up below her waist without looking too conspicuous. She wasn't sure how she was going to do that, but if she didn't want to get noticed, she'd have to figure it out soon.

Fuuka stole a quick, nervous glance down, hoping she'd somehow imagined the whole thing and she was still fully-dressed. The clear view of her modest white panties underneath her nylons was enough to tell her otherwise. Cringing with embarrassment, Fuuka quickly decided on her next move-

Fuuka might be able to recreate that idea with her jacket. While tying her jacket around her waist would still leave some of her lower half exposed, she might be able to mitigate that with her bag. Likewise, the pipe was unlikely to fall out of place due to her weight. All in all, the plan was, at least in terms of physical danger, not terribly bad.

Sliding the classroom window open, Fuuka eyed the drainage pipe to her left with trepidation. Shimmying down the side of the school, her nylons doing a negligible job of hiding her panties, the colors of her uniform jacket contrasting sharply with the walls of the school would surely have drawn the eye of any observers in the area. Thankfully that wasn't an issue. What was an issue, however, was the drainage pipe itself. Due to building codes, the pipe was affixed to the wall of the building with a series of metal rings. Though they barely stood out from the pipe itself, they still stuck out enough to potentially snag debris such as falling leaves or the like. In this particular case, while there may not have been any falling leaves to snag on the rings, there was an abundance of material on Fuuka's person just begging to snag on one of them. So focused on keeping her grip and climbing down quickly, Fuuka was completely oblivious to yet another part of her wardrobe getting ready to abandon her.

While there was nobody around at the moment, Fuuka would rather not chance somebody turning the corner of the building and getting an eyeful of her in this state. And so, steeling herself and preparing for the landing, Fuuka carefully released her grip from the drainage pipe and began her short fall. Unfortunately for her, the loose bit of zipper track on her jacket had caught onto one of the pipe's fastening rings. Her cell phone! Fuuka wanted to kick herself for overlooking this obvious choice. She could use her phone to call someone for help, someone to bring her clothes and get her out of this mess!

At least, she might be able to. To get her phone, she'd have to get to her bag, which would mean leaving the relative safety of the bushes. And even if she did venture out to retrieve the bag, the fall may very well have broken her phone and rendered that option completely invalid. Still, the chance of a quick solution that could save her from having to find a way home in her rapidly deteriorating state of dress might be worth it. Really, it was that or continue on and hope she could find a better solution.

Taking careful steps, Fuuka made sure to stay near the wildlife, ready to hop behind a tree or into some bushes in case there was any sign of people coming.

The idea of her in this state being photographed made Fuuka shiver, reminding her of just how important it was that she stay out of sight and stay on her guard.

It was this careful mindset that clued Fuuka in to the sound of approaching footsteps. Reacting quickly, she jumped for the nearest cover, which just so happened to be a particularly thick patch of bushes. While it wasn't comfortable, Fuuka was glad that the cluster of branches and needles more or less completely obscured her from view. Deciding against peeking out, lest she give herself away, Fuuka chose to listen to the footsteps as they approached, reached her location, and thankfully continued on their way. Whoever had walked by was none the wiser about the half-naked girl in the bushes.

Feeling relieved, Fuuka began pulling herself out of the bushes. Had she been paying more attention, she wouldn't have felt quite so relieved, as one of the pricklier branches of the bush had managed to snag her-

"I, I'm not dreaming... I'm... really here..." Her body began to shake, her palm resting against the cusp of her thighs while the other cupped her breast in a meek, protective gesture.

13411221111221111222211112221.content:
I can't run all the way back. It's too far. Fuuka thought, beginning to ascend the stairs again. Her progress halted as another thought entered her mind. I can't get on another train. So many people... packed so close... I can't.

This mental tug-of-war between two equally unpleasant options kept the embarrassed girl on the stairs, unable to will herself to move either way. Mental images of worst-case scenarios for either route flashed through Fuuka's head, each one making her knees shake. At this rate, she was going to be paralyzed with fear!

I can't just stand here on these stairs forever! Move, girl! Fuuka's mind snapped, spurring her into action.

With renewed vigor Fuuka quickly sprinted back up the stairs, running to a discreet corner of the platform before crouching down to try and stay somewhat hidden. Little consolation though it was, Fuuka was grateful that this horrible incident had happened when the weather was pleasant. The idea of having to deal with all this madness in winter made her shiver just thinking about it. Of course, she'd rather this whole series of events never happened in the first place, but that was besides the point.

Just as she began to wonder how long she'd be stuck waiting, Fuuka's prayers were answered as a train came racing into the station before pulling to a stop and depositing a mass of commuters. Fuuka would have to time this just right to keep her exposure to a minimum. Thankfully, things finally seemed to be going her way as a large gap in people disembarking gave her ample opportunity to run into the nearest car, and it was even somewhat empty!

Of course, Fuuka should have known things were going too well. As the train doors closed and she felt the car begin to move, Fuuka let out a sigh of relief, only to find it ill-timed as-

Fuuka knew it was too good to be true. She simply wasn't willing to let her guard down, knowing full well having the train completely to herself al the way home would be a divine intervention-level miracle.

So when she heard the doors sliding open, she reacted swiftly, and dove under the nearest seat. It was too low to the ground to even sit up, much less stand. Fuuka had to lie under it, with barely enough room to slip her arms beneath her and keep her intimates protected, for whatever good that would do.

She saw footsteps settle down around her, and then a pair of legs swing over the seat she was hiding under. No question about it, Fuuka was trapped there.

She only had to keep this up for around five minutes, then the train would be at her dorm. How she'd get out, well... she'd figure that out then.

Fuuka sighed, trying to relax enough to let her eyes shut. She was tired, a small rest wouldn't hurt.

Fuuka awoke suddenly, startled into consciousness by the sound of the intercom.

"NOOOOO!" Fuuka screamed as she heard that, any notion of keeping calm thrown to the winds. The train was leaving the last stop! She was going to be stuck in that car, naked, all night! She clamored out from under the bench in a frantic reaction before running to the door.

On one hand, she was very glad that the car was empty. Not that it mattered. She stumbled and reached for the doors, hurrying out as fast as her bare feet could carry her.

1341122111122111122221111222122.title: ...depart the last stop for the evening."

13411221111221111222211112221221.content:
"Please step back. The doors will now close."

"NOOOO!" Fuuka screamed again, and dove for the doors, just in time for them to slam helplessly shut before her. She got up, winding her thin fingers in between the door, pulling for dear life, even leaning a leg up to try and give it additional leverage.

It was useless. The doors were shut tight. The train went quiet... and to Fuuka's horror, all the lights went out. Whoever had been driving had left, and she was trapped in the train... alone, and worse of all, naked.

"W, what am I going to do..." She whispered to herself deliriously as she sat down in the darkness, rubbing her sides weakly.

Fuuka soon felt exhaustion take over. She slowly leaned to the side, shaking as she let unconsciousness overtake her. Maybe she'd wake up and this would just be all one horrible dream.

She awoke, tense and alarmed. Her hands went to her sides, pushing herself up into a seated posture. It wasn't dark anymore. The train was well lit, in fact. It had to be morning. She could get out!

By the time Fuuka felt herself waking up to this reassuring thought, she saw the doors open before her.

The first thing the crowd of commuters saw upon entry was an upright girl, hands at her sides, legs slightly ajar, wearing nothing but a terrified expression.

"Oh no..."

Before she could react further, the doors closed, and Fuuka tried to tell herself it couldn't be any worse.

It wasn't until the train next stopped at her high school that she was proven more wrong than ever.

She breathed a sigh of relief as the train sped off, then looked around, trying to discern where she was.

In the middle of the night, it hadn't taken long for her to put two and two together. It was the mall.

The poorly lit, abandoned mall, a good number of blocks from home.

Sure, she was alone... but the Dark Hour couldn't be far off. What if she was caught outside by shadows, or worse... a roaming street gang?

The thought made her shiver. Still, there seemed no safer time to head straight for the dorms.

1341122111122111122221111222122212.content:
It had been a nerve-wracking run to say the least. Every step Fuuka had taken in that cold evening had felt as loud as a gunshot, as if everyone in town could easily see her. Yet somehow... no one had, and she reached the outside of Iwatodai Dorm.

The ill-defended girl was cold, scared, and above all, plainly naked, but for once, she felt a twinge of relief.

Even that was taken away when she reached her shaking hands up and pulled on the handle, only to be met by the unforgiving resistance of a locked door.

"N, no...! Please open up...!" Fuuka raised her voice into the cold night, and meekly rapped her fists against the door.

Nothing. "No, they... they have to be there...!"

Fuuka looked around in growing panic. It was either get into that dorm somehow, or... or... she didn't know!

Fuuka took a deep breath, and tried to calm her rattled nerves. She had to focus. Some calm returned to her, and with that small resolution, Fuuka set her mind to...
1341122111122111122221111222122212.title: The dorm was locked!

Fuuka couldn't give up. She was home, and once she got inside, she'd be safe. She just couldn't get in through the front, that was all. She looked past the stairs, and to the nearest window. Sometimes they opened it for a breeze. There was a chance... and she had to take it. Fuuka wasted no time in climbing over the railing and going down into the bushes. She shimmied along the wall, got to the window as fast as she could, and reached down to pull it open.

She didn't want to rush, but the bushes were barely waist-high. If someone happened to walk by... no, not a pretty thought. Fuuka closed her eyes, stood up straight with a firm grip on the window, and yanked as hard as she could, which resulted in...
13411221111221111222211112221222121.title: Continuing to try and get into the dorm, somehow.

The morning began just as most school days started for Minako Arisato- with her slapping the off button on her alarm as its screech roused her from slumber. Minako was a heavy sleeper, and her occasional summons to the Velvet Room while she slept didn't seem to help. She suspected something about the place affected her sleep, made it a little less restful. But the Velvet Room's occupants had proven to be nothing but helpful, so she didn't hold it against them when they felt it necessary to summon her.

With a reluctant stretch, Minako sat up and looked at the calendar posted on her bedroom wall. It was Saturday, so at least tonight she'd be able to turn off her alarm and sleep in. At least, she could do that, but she also thought it might be worth heading to Tartarus tonight. The team could always use the exercise from fighting the Shadows, and there's no telling what useful items they might come across in their exploration. Of course, if she decided to bring the team to Tartarus, she'd need to do her usual ritual. It wasn't something she told the rest of the team about, and they didn't need to know. It made her feel more alive, and considering the very real danger they all faced when they ventured into the mysterious tower, feeling alive helped her remember what she fought for.

"Hm, I guess I could just do it without going to Tartarus. Kind of like having my cake and eating it too." Minako thought to herself as she brushed her teeth, the final step of her morning habits. In any case, she had to hurry; it might be Saturday, but it was still a school day all the same and it wouldn't look good to be late. It would look even worse to Mitsuru, who she had plans to go shopping with after school today.

Rushing out of the dorm, Minako made it to the monorail with a little time to spare. Quickly finding Yukari and Fuuka, Minako approached her friends and teammates, engaging them in pleasant morning conversation. It seemed like a perfectly normal morning, or as normal as life could get for any member of SEES. Minako had no idea what was in store for her today, if she did, she would have likely just stayed in bed...

Everything started to go wrong during-
14.title: Minako Arisato

141.content:
Minako wrinkled her nose as she left the gynasium. A good workout, but it had done nothing for the smell of her body. Humming to herself she entered the locker room and quickly stripped off her gym clothes and headed for the showers.

Not long after a happy, clean smelling Minako skipped to her locker in a skimpy towel. Her mood turned to confusion when she found the locker empty, devoid of her normal school clothes and her gym clothes.

"What the heck?" Minako asked, only to be interrupted by someone clearing their throat.

To her surprise, Minako found herself confronting a mob of other school girls, each rather plain looking and generic. Certainly no one who would warrant a portrait in an RPG game, which coincidentally none of them ever got...

"Ummm....hello?" Minako asked.

"Hi Minako. It is Minako, right?"

"Uhhh....yeah? Umm, I'm sorry, but for so reason my clothes are missing, so if you don't mind-"

"You've been making a lot of friends around here lately, Minako."

"Well...yeah. I guess I have. Back to the clothes, I-"

"A lot of MALE friends."

"Well, yeah. I like hanging out with guys and girls. Umm...about my clothes-"

"Like Akihiko-senpai."

"Oh, yeah! He's a lot of fun. A little obsessed with training, but he's a cute dork when you get to know him."

"...did you just call him a dork?!?"

"Yeah, I mean, he can be super intense and serious sometimes, and he's still dealing with some things in his past, but he's really fun when you get to know him."

"Yes, it must be nice getting to know him better.:

"Absolutely! It wasn't easy at first. I was a little intimidated by his constant gaggle of vapid fangirls. But once I figured out how to ignore those losers, it was...."

The mob leader looked livid.

Vapid. Fangirls.

Oh.

Oooooooooh.

142.content:
With the final bell, Minako let out a contented sigh. She was just about home free to a nice stretch of relaxation and fun. All she had left was one of her after school clubs, the only question was which one to attend?

Despite being a Saturday, Minako's clubs had somehow all managed to have special rescheduled meetings today. Mitsuru had called for a Student Council meeting, though she told Minako that she understood if her other clubs needed her. Photography club had been postponed while the special lights in the development room were replaced, and today was the earliest day the room had been serviceable again. Lastly, her sports club had to put off practice while their training area underwent some scheduled maintenance. It was certainly odd, having to make a decision like this on a Saturday, but that's just how life worked sometimes.

Minako thought long and hard about her decision. She always enjoyed photography club with Fuuka as company, so that could certainly be a good time. Mitsuru's meeting might be worth attending to make sure she stayed up to date on school policies and events. Sports club was always good for keeping Minako fit, though Tartarus likely did a better job of keeping her in shape; of course, practice in the school was less dangerous than fighting evil monsters in a labyrinthine tower...

After a few minutes of weighing her options, Minako made her choice and set course for-
142.title: One of Minako's after-school clubs

Naganaki Shrine
The school courtyard
1421.content:
Minako had always enjoyed photography. There was something magical in capturing moments on film, in her mind. While one's brain might lose details and memories of sights turned fuzzy, a picture would always retain that crisp clarity. Minako certainly enjoyed the company of Fuuka and Keisuke as well, the two of them being great friends that made the club meetings that much more fun.

It was a routine meeting, all things considered. Picture ideas were discussed between members, photos were developed with the utmost care, and good times were had by all. The catalyst for Minako's downward spiral that day came in the form of Fuuka approaching her near the end of the day. Something about Fuuka's body language told Minako that the other girl was nervous, but clearly wanted to discuss something with her.

"Hey, Fuuka-chan, what's up? You look like you've got something on your mind." Minako asked, trying to make Fuuka feel a bit more comfortable.

"Oh, it's nothing really. I just wanted to ask if you'd be willing to help me with an idea I had. I've got an idea for some pictures, but I need a second person to be the subject, and you're one of the only people I'm really comfortable asking to-" Fuuka stammered, only to be cut off by Minako.

"Say no more, Fuuka-chan. You need someone to pose for pictures, I'm your girl!" Minako beamed, always happy to help a friend in need.

Fuuka was clearly relieved at Minako's energetic agreement. Letting out a small sigh of relief, Fuuka smiled and said "Thank you, Minako-chan. I'll get everything ready when we're done here today."

"Alright. Where are we gonna do this thing?" Minako asked, curious as to what Fuuka had in mind. Her curiosity was piqued when Fuuka told her where to meet her.
1421.title: Photography club

The playground equipment
14212.content:
Minako was curious as to what Fuuka had in mind for her photo shoot. The Naganaki Shrine was certainly a quiet enough place that they could work in peace, so Fuuka clearly put thought into the location. Minako didn't have to wonder too long, as she saw the other girl waiting for her as she ascended the stairs to the shrine. Fuuka's face perked up at the sight of Minako, and she quickly walked up to her friend.

"There you are, Minako-chan. Thanks again for agreeing to do this, it really does mean a lot to me." Fuuka quickly said, still clearly nervous about something.

"What kind of leader would I be if I didn't help out my friends when they needed it?" Minako asked, still ready as ever. "So, what do you need me to do?"

Minako now knew that something was up; Fuuka's cheeks took on a slight red hue as she avoided eye contact with Minako. Fiddling with her camera, Fuuka quickly began to explain her idea.

"Well, I've never been happy with any of my photography. I mean, I get the technical aspects of it all, but I just can't manage to make anything decently artistic. So, I thought maybe I should try something new, something other than just landscapes and still life. I decided that maybe going way outside the box, I might find that artistic aspect I just can't find. So, well, uh... I need you to, er, disrobe." Fuuka explained, her cheeks reddening with every word and the final part of her monologue said so fast Minako practically didn't understand her.

"You want me to... disrobe? You mean, like, pose in my underwear?" Minako asked, feeling a little uncertain about agreeing to Fuuka's request earlier. Still, Minako wasn't one to go back on her word, and she did trust Fuuka.

"Not exactly, no." Fuuka said, still refusing to look anywhere but at her own shoes. "I mean all the way. I-I mean you won't be showing anything too private to the camera, we'll use strategic scenery to cover that! And I'll make sure your face doesn't appear in anything, nobody will ever know it's you!"

Minako really wanted to say no, the idea made her uneasy. Letting Fuuka photograph her naked? Out in a public place like the shrine? But Minako could see how much courage it took for Fuuka to even approach her about this idea, and Minako believed Fuuka's assurances that her identity and privates would be safe from the finished product. As much as she'd rather not, Minako's obligation to help her friends won through, and she found herself sighing in defeat.

"Don't worry, Fuuka-chan. I'll do it. But only for you, and nobody hears about this, right?" Minako asked, to which Fuuka replied with an energetic nod. "Alright. So, where are we starting this? And where can I put my clothes?"

"You can put your clothes in my bag. They'll be perfectly safe there." Fuuka said, gaining confidence from her friend's resolution to go through with her idea. "So, I've got two ideas. The first one is to have you posing at the shrine itself; you know, look like you're praying or making an offering. The other would be for us to use the playground equipment over there. There's plenty of stuff there you could hide yourself behind, so we could have some creative poses there."

Weighing her options while starting to disrobe, Minako considered Fuuka's advice. It would certainly be a memorable experience either way, so it really all came down to personal preference. Flipping a coin in her head, Minako decided she'd go ahead and head over to-
14212.title: Naganaki Shrine

142121.content:
Standing there, naked as the day she was born and slightly shivering in the cool night air, Minako was suddenly all too aware of just what she was doing. She was really going to go through with it, letting Fuuka photograph her like this. While she was nervous, she was also slightly giddy. While she'd never tell Fuuka about this, this wasn't too far off from what Minako's little ritual entailed, minus the camera and the photographer and poses of course. Indeed, it was always the fear of suddenly finding herself with an audience that helped Minako feel so alive, but that was neither here nor there. Stepping up to the shrine, Minako instinctively began to go through the motions of prayer. The sound of the camera clicking helped remind Minako that this was anything but a routine visit to the shrine.

"Good idea for a first shot, Minako-chan." Fuuka said, snapping a few more pictures as she spoke. "I think that should be the general idea. Just go about doing whatever you'd normally do at the shrine, just forget about being undressed."

Minako didn't need Fuuka's advice, as she was going through the motions to try and make herself feel normal. She visited all of the shrine's fixtures, Fuuka revolving around her the whole time. Minako could only trust that Fuuka was keeping her more intimate spots out of most, if not all, of her photos, especially some of her more ambitious frontal shots. One in particular, of Minako as she pantomimed presenting an offering, had the naked girl somewhat nervous. Fuuka assured her that the top of the picture wouldn't reach her nipples and her hands blocked any view of the treasure between her legs, but Fuuka's assurances didn't make Minako feel terribly secure. She could only hope that Fuuka chose to develop the film somewhere other than the club dark room, just in case she made a mistake in one of the shots.

As they were wrapping up the shoot, at least Minako figured there couldn't be too much more she could do for the camera, the moment came that signaled the night's change from unusual to disaster-in-the-making. It was the sound of footsteps, several pairs by the sound of it, heading down the street and towards the shrine.

"Oh no, someone's coming!" Fuuka gasped, herself not wanting to be caught doing something that could so easily be construed as obscene. Operating on fear instinct, Fuuka quickly put away her camera and picked up her bag. Minako could see that Fuuka was ready to bolt, her panic causing her to forget something the naked girl considered incredibly important.

"Fuuka, hold on, all my stuff is in your bag!" Minako cried, hoping to remind her friend of the predicament she was in.

"We gotta run! Come on Minako!" Fuuka fired back in a quick whisper, her hand resting on her bag.

1421211.content:
Minako's face fell as Fuuka firmly latched her hand to her bag and continued running. Only running was on her mind, not her friend's predicament. The intent was to keep the bag from catching, spilling, or anything else. A wonderful idea for someone who only needs to run away. A dreadful one if a spill is exactly what a dear friend needs. Fuuka's concern for herself and her gear left a pale Minako to bask in the artificial light surrounding the shrine while the crisp breeze teased her sensitive flesh.

The footsteps only grew louder, snapping the SEES leader from her mumbled prayers and sending her running towards the offertory box. It wouldn't be very hard to hide from the street if she ducked down behind it, but the milky white skin of her back could be seen if her interlopers were here to make a prayer. Anything else would have been preferable, but with the bell locked up for the night the only other hiding spots were the statues along the side of the box and the support beams behind them. They'd offer the same protection, but Minako would have to be on her knees the whole time, leaving one bad slip to expose her in more ways than one, and she could be seen from the sides. The box allowed her to lie down and focus on the world around her, await the moment when she could make her way back to the dorm.

Minako felt her heart sink. Even on the other side of the shrine, they could be heard as clearly as a gun shot. The group had stopped in front of the shrine, surrounding Minako. She'd have to endure this and hope they go away without approaching the shrine. Fortunately, they were still on the sidewalk, letting Minako rest easy for a moment. It was an opportunity to replay the night in her mind and figure out how this whole thing turned sour, or find some way to get out of this without hurting Fuuka's feelings.

"'Sorry Fuuka-chan, but I can't do it,'" Minako mumbled to her imagination. "'I'd love to help you, but Junpei-kun found out some creep's been taking secret photos of me. I don't think I should strip in public under these circumstances.'"

Why didn't I just say that? It's Fuuka-chan! I can talk to her about anything! She'd worry about me, forget about her photos, and we'd get ice cream to talk about solutions. All I had to do was tell my friend my...troubles. And then she wouldn't feel responsible if someone else posted other nude pics of me around school...

Her eyes downcast, Minako continued, "Maybe I wasn't such a good friend tonight, Fuuka-chan."

"D'you guys here something?" one of the intruders called.

Shut up, Minako! Stop mumbling and keep it to yourself!

Minako has to sneeze.
14212112.content:
"Probably just a dog." answered another voice. "The city's full of strays."

Minako heaved a sigh of relief (internally, at least), glad that whoever was around the shrine hadn't decided to look into the noise any further. She was less glad, however, that the intruders didn't seem to be walking away. Rather, their footsteps were slowing and settling around the shrine area, as if they weren't planning to leave any time soon. Minako heard the clicking of a lighter followed by the sound of a sharp intake of breath. Whoever was out there was apparently using the shrine as a smokers' hangout...

The trembling high schooler could only wait, facing the ground and contemplating her situation. Here she was, naked as a jaybird, blocks and blocks away from the dorms, with who knows how many strangers so close they'd have an eyeful if not for the offertory box. She couldn't risk making another noise, lest her "company" fail to write it off as a dog again, so her only auditory comfort came in the form of eavesdropping on their conversation. It honestly wasn't anything special, just small talk, complaints about the workplace, their assessment of some of the women they knew (which didn't help Minako's comfort), and their thoughts on the newest episode of their favorite show.

As the night wore on, Minako became more acutely aware of how cold Iwatodai could get in the evenings. Doing her best to keep from shivering, Minako tried to focus on something else; particularly, the feeling of the rough concrete on her sensitive skin. Usually the most of her skin touching concrete was her hands, and occasionally her feet, but her entire front side was a different story. In a way, the rough texture of the concrete against her soft flesh was almost... exciting. Minako's mind stalled for a second at that thought. Was she... was she getting turned on by this? No way, that would be ridiculous! She was just tired, and her mind was going weird places because of it. Yeah, that's the right answer, absolutely...

In any case, the conversation between her uninvited company wore on and on, and Minako lost track of time. More than that, Minako lost track of her body's own condition, compromised as it was by the late hour and the chilly air.
14212112.title: It was something else entirely and they leave.....

choices: A group of Shadows surrounding her - It was the Dark Hour!!!
Fuuka had returned for her... but without her bag!
142121121.content:
Despite her best efforts to stay awake, Minako's will slowly wore down as the hours passed by. It had been a very long week. Between school, social events, and Tartarus, all she wanted more than anything at that moment was to just curl up in her cozy, fluffy bed and sleep until the afternoon. Instead, she was freezing her literal butt off on cold, rough concrete, unable to even scratch her nose out of fear that she would be spotted.

She considered just bolting for it. By this point, she was desperate enough that all she wanted was to get back to where it was safe and warm, even if that meant giving a bunch of strangers a little peep show. After all, she might get sick if she stayed out here all night! But just as she mustered her nerve to do so, something other than fear stopped her. Both of her legs weren't moving at all. They had gone numb from the cold!

By waiting for so long, her body had succumbed to exhaustion and began to fall asleep. Upon realizing that her legs were now as stiff and immobile as the surrounding statues of the shrine, it was as if a chain reaction had begun. The rest of her body quickly followed suit, collapsing fully on the ground with a soft pat.

As Minako's senses slowly seeped away, she thought she could hear the strangers' voices in the distance. She could only hope that she hadn't alerted them to her presence, especially now that she could no longer lift a finger to defend herself. Mentally cursing her overall situation as well as Fuuka for leaving her high and dry, Minako soon lost consciousness.

Completely exhausted as she was, the next few hours passed in the blink of an eye for her. The good news was that Minako had succeeded in keeping hidden from the other people, who soon left the shrine to head back home for the night. The bad news was that someone else would later find the sleeping beauty, interrupting her much-needed rest with rude and unwelcome prodding. Dazed from her ordeals and groggily raising her head, Minako blinked in surprise as she beheld-
142121121.title: Minako dozes off.

choices: The Dark Hour ends, leaving Minako on the crowded street.
The Shadows corner Minako.
1421211211.content:
The first thing Minako's eyes beheld was a blue mask against complete darkness. While the average person might be confused at such a sight, Minako instead panicked as she realized she was face-to-face with a Shadow! "Huh... Maybe that's why you didn't get sick but the rest of us did?" Yukari asked only somewhat-jokingly.

"Heh, maybe... ha ha" Minako shrugged, sharing a laugh with Yukari.

Yukari then suddenly grabbed the other girl's hands. "Hey, Minako-chan, can't you change your mind?" she asked seriously.

"I-I'm sorry, Yukari-chan," Minako answered. "But we've already agreed to do this. Everyone's getting ready, I can't change it now."

"What!? Please! You're our leader!" Yukari begged. "A leader's gotta look out for her friends, right? I'm literally dying over here, and Stupei apparently has it twice as bad as I do if his whining actually means anything! You can't make us go!"

"But, Akihiko-san's perfectly fine," Minako replied. "And so is the rest of the team. So if he can do it you and Junpei can too. I believe-"

"ARGH! THAT MEATHEAD!" Yukari grumbled. "I'm going to give *achoo* him a piece of my mind!" she stamped off to her room in a hurry, slamming her door in a huff.

"Whoa... She didn't even realize her towel fell off halfway through the hall," Minako muttered, looking at the damp, pink cloth that lay abandoned in Yukari's wake.

She really needed that shower now.

Making sure to lock the door, Minako got in the shower and instantly felt at peace. Her worries about her sick teammates flowed off of her like the water dripping down her body, unease being destroyed with each scrub of the loofa. Everything would be fine. Her sick friends would be on the sidelines, taking it easy while she, Mitsuru, Ken, and Koromaru would do the heavy lifting today. And best of all, they'd finish up that block tonight and then everyone could get some well-deserved relaxation time. It wasn't easy, but it needed to be done.

Feeling completely refreshed once again, Minako turned off the water, ready to take trouble head-on. However, she quickly found that trouble was getting a sneak attack on her, as-
1451.title: Taking a shower right before the mission.

choices: Minako relents, and Yukari provides a towel... of sorts.
Minako relents, and Yukari finds other ways to extort her in the future.
Minako refuses to call the mission off, provoking Yukari's ire.
14512.content:
Minako stuck an arm out of the shower, her hand groping along the tiled wall towards the towel bar. Once Minako's arm was extended as far as it could go and she still felt nothing but smooth tile, she curiously peeked her head out of the shower, assuming the towel must have slipped off the bar while she was bathing. Looking at the floor, Minako didn't see the towel she expected... in fact, there was no sign of her towel anywhere!

"What the...?" Minako gasped. "Where did my towel go?"

Could somebody have taken it while she was showering? Lost as she was in the luxurious feeling of the shower, it was possible, she supposed. Still, what could anybody seek to gain from doing something like this? Right before a mission to Tartarus really wasn't the time for a juvenile prank. Reluctantly, Minako tip-toed out of the shower and across the bathroom floor to the door. Unlocking the door, Minako peeked her head out carefully, making sure not to open the door any further than absolutely necessary. Hopefully somebody would be nearby and able to help.

"Hello? I have a bit of a problem over here..." Minako called out, her voice torn between wanting to avoid drawing attention to herself, but also hoping to get somebody's attention.

"Oh, hey Minako-chan!" came Yukari's cheerful voice, followed quickly by the speaker in question popping into view around the door. "What's up?"

"I, uh... did you see anybody sneak into the bathroom after me?" Minako asked, though she had a sneaking suspicion she knew what happened.

"Sneak in?" Yukari repeated, sniffling. "I mean, what reason would anyone have to do that? Unless they wanted to steal your towel and hold you hostage or something..."

"Yukari..." Minako growled. "This isn't funny! Come on and give me something to cover up with!"

"Hey, don't get mad at me because you couldn't keep an eye on your things!" Yukari countered. "It almost makes me hesitant to help you out. Now, I could be persuaded to loan you one of my towels."

"And what do I need to do to persuade you?" Minako asked.

"Just call off our Tartarus mission. Let me get some actual sleep any maybe get over this cold!" Yukari snapped. "We can't all be perfectly healthy all the time like some people!"

Was Yukari's request really so outrageous? There were plenty of other days the team could climb the tower, and still a few weeks before the next full moon. Still, if Minako let herself be blackmailed like this, it could set a nasty precedent. This was an important decision for the SEES leader and she knew it. She had to make her decision carefully...
14512.title: Her towel was missing!

choices: Minako overcomes, and shoves them both into the hallway.
Yukari pushes through, and tackles them both into the showers.
145123.content:
Thinking on it, it was a more than reasonable request, but Minako had her own plans for the next week once they reached the next checkpoint. Possible blackmailing and corruption of intent aside, if Yukari convinced her to take the night off, then they would have to climb Tartarus some other time, but if complications arose and made this all take longer and, god forbid, she herself got sick later, it would throw her other plans all out of balance! Managing Social Links, classes, and Tartarus all at once was not easy. Yukari only needed to worry about one of those, while Minako had to manage all three at one time! Really, persevering for one extra night wasn't that much to ask of anyone.

"Yukari," Minako said, with an edge to her voice. "I understand you're not feeling well, but you have abilities none of the rest of the team has. We need you there. I can let you rest on the sidelines until we absolutely need you. It's the same as-"

"The same!? Bullshit!" Yukari screamed. "Even thinking of comparing my soft, warm bed to that freaky, horrible tower... there's something seriously wrong with you!"

"We're going, Yukari, and that's final," Minako said with utmost seriousness.

"Fine then," Yukari said, "If we're going, I'll just bring everyone up here for a nice little chat with our leader, who's naturally already prepared and not shivering, helpless and naked in the bathroom, all thanks to having lost her towel. Oh wait, that's exactly what's happening right now. I wonder what Mitsuru-senpai would think, seeing our Leader like this?" she asked, smirking venomously and turning towards the stairs.

"Yeah, I can't say that she'd be very pleased with you," Minako answered.

Yukari paused. "Me? Uh, you're the one who's, well, out of uniform right now, in case you forgot," she said.

"Perhaps," Minako replied. "But once I tell her everything and she learns that you stole my towel and trapped me here all because you couldn't handle being on standby for an hour at most, how do you think Mitsuru would react to that?"

"Ghh!" Yukari grimaced.

"Sure, I'm naked right now, and yeah, it'll be embarrassing getting seen like this by everybody, e-especially by the guys," Minako stammered a little, blushing. "But Mitsuru's not an idiot, Yukari. No matter what lie you tell at first, it won't take long before she realizes what really happened. So just stop this nonsense now, please?"

Yukari stood still, her fists balled up at her sides. Soon, she started to shake, and began to growl, "Erg... grr... ARGH!" Whirling around, she charged to the door and threw it open, almost smashing into Minako in the process.

"Ah!" Minako gasped, too startled to react.

"If I can't get you to call it off, I'll have you sleep it off!" Yukari roared, grabbing Minako's shoulders and pushing her back towards the showers. "Minako? Oh, she had a little spill during her usual shower and won't wake up for the rest of the Dark Hour, at least."

Minako struggled and planted her feet, stopping Yukari's advance right in front of the stall. "Yukari, you're crazy!" she grunted, grabbing at Yukari's sweater collar and turning the situation into a test of strength.

"No, I'm sick!" Yukari yelled. "I need some TLC time to get better, and you're just being, oof, stubborn. Just let it happen, it'll only be a minor concussion, I promise!"

"Get off!" Minako shouted back. Minako couldn't believe what was happening. Fighting against her close comrade was something she never thought she'd be doing, let alone being wet and naked while doing it! But now wasn't the time for thoughts, it was the time for action, and she began to focus solely on the battle. First things first, she needed to get out of the bathroom. She was wet, and the floor was also wet, meaning she could slip and fall at any moment. And with Yukari in a blind rage right now, it was not an ideal battleground. The hallway outside, however, had dry carpet and was more spacious, which would make a much better fighting arena. It would all hinge on who won this first struggle...
145123.title: Minako refuses to call the mission off, Yukari mad

choices: "Then you two are barred from the dorms. Give me your towels."
"Then you can use a couple of Koro-chan's spare dog collar Evokers."
1451231.content:
Yukari had the advantage of surprise, clothes, and the slippery environment. She had made three serious miscalculations, however. First, her desperation to avoid Tartarus tonight was high, but so was Minako's desire to preserve her dignity and consciousness! Second, her illness naturally hampered her stamina and physical abilities, making Yukari physically weaker and less effective in her struggles. And perhaps her biggest mistake was underestimating how powerful Minako was. Although she seemed frail and naked, Minako's physical abilities were naturally enhanced by whatever Persona she chose to mask herself in. And with the full moon so close, it just so happened that Minako had spent a good portion of the previous evening fusing a potent combination of new Personas, maximizing social links and multiple fusions to obtain the most powerful entities at the highest levels she could. Her current Persona was the strongest of the lot. A little water and nudity weren't going to be enough to win this contest.

In short, despite a brief moment when it appeared Yukari might gain enough leverage to force Minako backwards, the naked girl managed maintain her footing and dragged them both out of the bathroom while grappling with Yukari's sweater and skirt.

"You know what, Yukari-chan? That towel sounds nice...but I think I'd rather just wear your clothes instead! And if you don't make a fuss, I might even let you have the towel for yourself afterwards!" Minako said.

"Wha! Like hell!" Yukari roared.

The struggle quickly escalated into a wrestling match, Yukari's hands soon becoming entangled in her sweater and bra while her legs were fighting madly to keep her skirt and panties from being stripped entirely off her. Angry and desperate, both girls proceeded to grasp, pin, and rub their bodies together in a manner that both would have found utterly humiliating if they took a moment to consider what their battle would look like from the outside.

"Just give it up!" Minako snapped.

"You first! Stop it before it-"

RIP! RIP! RIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIP

Both girls paused in horror at the sound of multiple garments tearing themselves apart as Yukari's clothes and undergarments finally gave up and shredded themselves between the two wet and naked girls.

"Noooooo!" Both girls said at once.

"Ahem..."

Fresh from the horror of losing their chance for modesty, both girls slowly turned at the sound of the voice. Mitsuru Kirijo stood behind them, hands on her hips, eyes glaring down like the goddess of death itself. With a frantic shriek, both girls untangled themselves, glanced at the own nudity, frantically sought and found Yukari's pink towel, briefly dove and fought for the article before finding a small truce between them and dangling the cloth between the pair of them. It barely covered their frontal nudity and provided no defense for their exposed butts.

..................................................

The sound of Mitsuru's boots stomping up and down the main lobby of the SEES dorms was the only noise any of the residents could hear. The elder member of the shadow execution squad paced back and forth, her hands clasped behind her back and a stony expression of restrained fury and concentration on her face. Not far away, Yukari and Minako stood side by side, each clad in a skimpy towel (the only concession Mitsuru allowed for their dignity was that each be allowed to hide her nudity behind an individual towel rather than explain themselves while sharing one...and then only because Junpei and less obviously Akihiko kept trying to catch a glimpse of their bare backs).

"Mitsuru-senp-" Yukari began.

"QUIET!" Mitsuru snapped, causing both girls to gulp and look at the floor.

Drawing in a breath, Mitsuru said at last. "This is beyond unacceptable."

Minako dared to raise her head. "Mitsuru-senpai, I agree completely, but if we could just get dressed before we talk about Yukari's-"

"That's quite the interesting assumption you are making, Minako-chan." Mitsuru interrupted. "That all we have to discuss would be Yukari."

"...Well...why wouldn't it-"

"A team member comes to let you know that they are in need of rest and rehabilitation, and you refuse their request multiple times, to the point that they are driven to blackmail and physical threats? You don't find that troubling?" Mitsuru asked.

"I..." Minako trailed off.

"As a leader, it was your responsibility to measure how hard you are pushing your team. A sick party member can easily fall prey to shadows. You know this better than anyone, yet you were willing to risk your subordinate's welfare for the sake of keeping to a schedule! Moreover, your response to Yukari's threats was to provoke her rather than call for help or otherwise gain my or Akihiko's attention to resolve the situation peacefully. Have I missed anything, team leader?" Mitsuru asked.

"I...she...but..." Minako mumbled, before shying away from Mitsuru's glare. "No, ma'am."

Yukari snickered, then gulped when Mitsuru turned toward her. "I wouldn't laugh just yet, Yukari-chan. If Minako shares more of the blame than she wants to admit, it should be obvious that your behavior was unacceptable as well!"

Yukari looked down, then bit her lip. "Well, if she had just listened-"

"Then what? You wouldn't have threatened to humiliate and attack your squad leader? As if either those options are remotely acceptable!" Mitsuru snapped.

"What was I supposed to-"

"At a glance? Speaking to either myself or Akihiko to intervene on your behalf would have been the most effective solution. Certainly a better option than threatening to humiliate your classmate and comrade in arms like a schoolyard bully! And attacking her? The only reason I don't suspend you from this team and this school altogether for such actions is that I believe your judgment to be impaired by this illness you are suffering under!"

Both girls hung their heads in sullen anger and embarrassment. Mitsuru glanced from one to the other, sighing to herself.

"But what I find most troubling...most frightening...is that we have come this far and are still prone to such divisions. A squad leader should not have to fear being undercut so severely by her subordinates. A subordinate should not have to go to such lengths convince a leader of her weakness and need for rest! If something as simple as the date of our mission can divide us this much, what will happen on the night of the full moon? If you can't work together, someone will end up dead!" Mitsuru said solemnly.

The nearly naked girls hung their heads, looking properly chastened.

"Will you apologize to one another?" Mitsuru asked.

The pair glanced at each other, sucked in a breath, and spat out. "No! She should apologize to me!"

Mitsuru closed her eyes as the girls glared at each other. "Very well. For the time being, I'm taking charge of Tartarus operations."

"We're still going?!?" Yukari asked.

"Correct. Your actions have completely overridden any regard you might be owed for your physical condition. Consider this an Execution."

Both girls gulped. Then Yukari smiled. "Oh? So you want us to go in there without our Evokers? Isn't that reckless?"

"What do you mean?" Mitsuru asked.

"Oh nothing. Its just that I MAY have hidden mine and Minako's along with her clothes, and you probably won't find were they are until after the Dark Hour is over! It was my 'plan b'." Yukari smiled.

Mitsuru glared a moment, then began smiling back in a way that terrified both girls. Her words justified their fears completely.
1451231.title: Minako overcomes, and shoves them both into the...

choices: Okay, fine! We apologize!
If I have to go down, at least I can take her with me!
14512312.content:
The two girls blinked, glanced at one another, then back at Mitsuru.

"Koro's...." Yukari began.

"....dog collar?" Minako finished.

"Indeed. We made several backups of his Evoker. The Kirijo Group was concerned that giving an animal might be more prone to losing or damaging his Evoker than a human." Mitsuru said.

"Uhhh...Mitsuru-senpai....aren't those meant to...you know...work on dogs? We're human, last I checked." Yukari said.

"Well, to be fair, you can act like a real b-" Junpei called from down the hallway.

"Finish that sentence and you can join them, Iori." Mitsuru snapped.

"I'll be good." Junpei said in a less enthusiastic voice.

"And yes, Yukari. They are meant for dogs. You'll have to take pains to 'fool' the system." Mitsuru said.

"....And how do we do that?" Minako asked, sincerely dreading where this was leading.

"Simple enough. Crawl on all fours, howl at the moon, and otherwise act the part." Mitsuru said with a smile.

Yukari and Minako blushed at the notion.

"No way!" Yukari finally managed to stammer out.

"I'm willing to give you another chance. Apologize to each other now, and we can forgo this ordeal. This is the last time I'll make that offer." Mitsuru said, crossing her arms.

The girls glanced at each other, then turned their heads away with a mutual "hmph".

"All right. Don't say I didn't try." Mitsuru nodded.

"Ummm...not to spoil this moment, Mitsuru...but will that actually work? Aren't the Evokers supposed to remind of us death in order to call up our Personas?" Akihiko asked.

"Indeed. The Evoker serves as both a mystical bridge between the material and the mental realms and a tool to call forth our own fears and anxieties to break through other mental blockades to reach our true selves. The fear of death is one of our most common and deep seated emotions, and thus a useful catalyst for calling out the Persona. But we have other fears. The Kirijo Group has long speculated that it is possible to summon a Persona by exploiting other common fears."

"Such as?" Akihiko asked.

"Public humiliation." Mitsuru responded. "For example, being made to wear a collar and act like a domesticated pet."

"Harsh." Junpei whispered.

"I did call it an Execution. It would hardly qualify if I held back." Mitsuru stated.

"Huh. Put it that way, it starts sounding kinda tame. I mean, after what we went through over the hot spring...." Junpei trailed off.

"Perhaps it would be. If either were allowed to have anything but the collar on." Mitsuru said evenly.

"WHAT??" Both girls asked.

"Both of you were willing to strip the other for your own purposes. Consider this your just reward. Besides which, the shame of acting like an animal alone might not be enough to summon a Persona. This is a simple insurance policy."

"You can't!" Minako said.

"I can. Now, are you certain neither of you want to make that apology?"

Minako put up a valiant defense, but circumstances conspired against her. Water dripping down her legs pooled on the slick tile of the bathroom floor, and a firm shove from Yukari shifted Minako's feet and sent her slipping and staggering backwards. With Minako's grip on Yukari's sweater holding strong, the SEES leader pulled her raging friend right along with her into the shower stall.

Minako winced as she felt her back slam against the water dial, turning the handle and sending water shooting from the shower head above. Unfortunately for both girls, their back-to-back showers had exhausted the hot water supply, resulting in a chilly rain dousing them both. 151.content:
Chihiro Fushimi readied herself for another day of school. As much as she knew that she had to go, she'd have loved to just stay home and avoid the crowds. Chihiro had never been a very social person, and being forced to interact with others was almost always an awkward experience. Rather than spend the day buried in her books, however, Chihiro was resolved to face the day. After all, there was a Student Council meeting today, and Chihiro would have to be there as Treasurer. As much as she didn't like being saddled with the responsibility of Treasurer, not being that great with numbers, Chihiro had learned to accept it. She was usually all but invisible during the meetings, and she even had a bit of a friend in that new girl, Minako.

Of course, Chihiro would still have to make it through the rest of the school day. Between being called on to answer questions in class, trying to hold it together when boys tried to make conversation with her, and making sure she had everything ready for the meeting, it was going to be as troublesome of a day as any. But that was Chihiro's lot in life and she was resolved to face it head on.

The trip to school was the usual affair; Chihiro would do her best to be essentially invisible, hiding her face behind her long brown hair when she worried that somebody might be looking at her. Chihiro had discovered that hiding herself seemed to deter the perverts that usually lurked on the monorail line, and she very rarely had to deal with anybody "accidentally" bumping into her and copping a feel. In school, however, hiding like that wouldn't work. She couldn't just hide her face and pretend to be invisible, as she was expected to carry herself well as a member of the Student Council. All she wanted was for the day to go by without incident. Unfortunately for the shy bookworm, fate had a different plan in store.

This poor twist of fate began-

Every school day would find Chihiro spending her entire lunch break in the library, her nose buried in one book or another. Most other students spent the hour in their classrooms or one of the more noise-friendly hangouts, though a few opted to study in the library. Of course the students that chose the last option were so few that Chihiro had no trouble finding an empty spot in the library to enjoy herself.

Setting down the book she had just finished, a fun if generic fantasy story, Chihiro stood up and thought of what to start reading next. Perhaps science-fiction, or a historical fiction, Chihiro thought as she quietly walked through the fiction section. For a few minutes Chihiro perused the books with little success. "Read it. Read it. Read it. Not my type... hmm." Chihiro thought to herself. Finally, out of the corner of her eye, Chihiro saw a title that caught her eye. The book was too high for Chihiro to reach on her own, meaning she'd have to go grab the stepladder.

A few minutes later, Chihiro was standing on top of a short stepladder, desperately reaching for the book she had seen. Even with the added height it was just barely out of Chihiro's reach. This wasn't going to deter the book lover, however, as Chihiro carefully raised herself up further, supporting herself only with her toes now, and just barely managed to get her fingers around the spine of the book. Finally! Chihiro managed to grab the book, now she could get back to reading! At least, that's what Chihiro would have liked to happen. Instead, as Chihiro silently rejoiced from her precarious position on the stepladder-

"Minako!" A familiar voice called.

The familiar attendant of the Velvet Room had an unusually serious look on her face.

"Minako, I must speak with you. And we must hurry. I fear my Master will soon overwrite time to prevent this conversation from occurring!"

"The one with the big glass window that says 'Break in case of emergencies'?" Minako asked.

"Yes. Well, this morning I broke it."

"You broke the Velvet Room's fourth wall?"

"Precisely. This conversation is only happening because I have broken the fourth wall."

"......"

"In any event, having done so i have glimpsed the strand of Fate and Destiny! And they all converge on this day!"

"That sounds serious!"

"It is! Apparently today someone chosen by Fate is going to get naked!"

"...What?"

"Naked! Without clothing! Stripped! Humiliated! Bereft of modesty! Seen in their birthday suit!"

"Okay, I get it!....WHY??"

".....I suspect Fate may at times be controlled by unseen forces of various proclivities...which in this case appears to be one or several perverted individuals that should feel absolutely terrible about the ordeals they put hapless women through for their own lust and amusement!"

Elizabeth then proceeded to give a very pointed and dour look that seemed to be just staring off into space from Minako's point of view but was most certainly in fact directed towards the reader and author.

"Worst of all, it seems Fate intends for ME to suffer!"

"Oh...that's....terrible." Minako whispered.

"Spare me your pretense! I am well aware you have enjoyed seeing me in a state of undress just as much as I have enjoyed seeing you in scenarios where Fate has chosen you for humiliation!"

"But she's so nice!"

"A...optional...what?"

"Chidori? But hasn't she been through enough as it is?"

"The point is that there are still many options left for these cruel fate manipulating godlings to choose from! If we beg they will show us mercy and pick someone else to humiliate!"

At that moment a thunderbolt came crashing down upon the two girls (inexplicably, as they were standing in an indoor mall and besides which there were no clouds in the sky that morning), instantly disintegrating their clothes. Yukari Takeba- Your typical high school girl. She's energetic, friendly, popular, and athletic. She's stubborn and headstrong, and this nature can cause her to not think her plans through all the way. As a member of the school archery team, she's got sharp eyes and steady nerves... most of the time.

Mitsuru Kirijo- A living definition of excellence, Mitsuru has it all. President of the Student Council, heiress to a multinational corporation, top of her class, and the calm and collected mind of a CEO. While she exceeds in all these areas and more, she severely lacks in street smarts, and is fairly aloof about social matters that would be normal among people in her age group. As a symbol of lust and jealousy of many in the school, plenty of people have their eyes on her.

Fuuka Yamagishi- Timid and meek, Fuuka is about as opposite Mitsuru as one can get. Generally quiet, but very kind and gentle, Fuuka is no stranger to being picked on by other girls in her class. While she doesn't boast, she might be as sharp as Mitsuru, at least when it comes to electronics and the like.

Minako Arisato- The female choice for the main character, her personality is largely the player's to mold. In general, she appears to possess a cheery attitude and is very good at making friends. The odds of anybody having a grudge against her are low; if she offends anybody, it's more than likely on accident.

Aigis- A humanoid robot, she is technically naked most of the time as it is. While she isn't a candidate to be stripped, she may find herself involved in the stories of one of the other girls, either aiding or hindering them, perhaps without even realizing it.
